entry.title: Vintage Hollywood Glitters - Bundle of 4 Colours!
entry.summary:
Vendor: Design Blanks
Type:
Price: 8.50 - 24.35 (2 variants)

This is loose 1/128 ultra fine glitter also known as 0.008 size. Beautiful quality. Exactly what you need for your crafting projects. This is cosmetic-grade glitter. 

All of our glitters are cosmetic grade.

In this bundle, you will receive 2 Laser Holographic and 2 regular glitters

Bling - (LB101)

Saturday Night Fever - (LB1002)

Black - (BO1000)

Gun Metal - (BO1002)

Bags come in 20gm or 100gm sizes.

We reserve the right to make substitutions with similar colours in a bundle.
